title: observed-data
description: Observed data conveys information that was observed on systems and networks, such as log data or network traffic, using the CybOX specification.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `observed-data`.

first_observed.description: The starting time of this Observed Data.

last_observed.description: The ending time this Observed Data. For single point in time data, this should match the start time.

number_observed.description: This is an integer between 0 and 999,999,999 inclusive.

cybox.description: The CybOX content that describes what was seen.
